metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35527 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In SQLite 3.31.1, there is an out of bounds access problem through ALTERTABLE for views that have a nested FROM clause.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35527` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.4
libsqlite3-0 - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.4
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.4
sqlite3 - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-4ubuntu0.4').
